content: sl sts of black between the row starting in the first st of r9 and work both colours alternating between as you complete rounds if you re like me then your sl sts are tighter than single_crochet sts so this works well to add shape and sort of elongate the center of the handle fasten_off black when finished with it between r13 and r14 row 15 flo single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 3 12 sts fasten_off and stuff the blade using blue stuff as you go every few row r1 blo of r15 of the handle *single_crochet decrease* around 8 single_crochet r2 ~23 single_crochet around 8 single_crochet i actually don t keep track of individual row here i just keep crocheting and count straight up and do approximately 23 row but you can use a stitch marker to keep track or make it as long as you want r24 decrease around 4 single_crochet fasten_off and it s done i reverse the colours for red lightsabers but you can also use two shades of grey or black and dark grey etc
